verses.name: Joshua 14:12
verses.text: Now therefore give me this mountain, whereof the Lord spake in that day; for thou heardest in that day how the Anakims were there, and that the cities were great and fenced: if so be the Lord will be with me, then I shall be able to drive them out, as the Lord said.

verses.name: Joshua 14:13
verses.text: And Joshua blessed him, and gave unto Caleb the son of Jephunneh Hebron for an inheritance.

verses.name: Joshua 14:14
verses.text: Hebron therefore became the inheritance of Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite unto this day, because that he wholly followed the Lord God of Israel.
